title: It
resume: A group of bullied kids band together when a monster, taking the appearance of a clown, begins hunting children.

title: Home Again
resume: Life for a single mom in Los Angeles takes an unexpected turn when she allows three young guys to move in with her.

title: Rememory
resume: The widow of a wise professor stumbles upon one of his inventions that's able to record and play a person's memory.
